reviewText: What can you say about a movie...with today's so called "realistic movies,or those that have so called "social messages", the old ones are such a relief to watch. We watch movies for entertainment value and are able to relax and enjoy. This is a wonderful movie and ends "everyone lives happily ever after. No thought, or worry involved. A nice break from the day.I'm so glad we can still purchase them..no matter how corney they are.
Title: Judith Krantz's Dazzle

reviewText: The movie is great.  The characters are good.  However, the quality and sound of the movie is not very good.
Title: Judith Krantz's Dazzle

reviewText: This is a miniseries that will keep your attention for sure. It's combination of a plot, romance, tragedy & reunion of sorts. Well written & Lisa's acting is superb.You will have to see it for yourself & you won't be disappointed if you are a Lisa Hartman fan.
Title: Judith Krantz's Dazzle

reviewText: This movie was a sheer treat.  Lisa Hartman Black and Linda Evans in the same movie.  Yes I enjoyed it and would recommend it.
Title: Judith Krantz's Dazzle

reviewText: I loved this movie when I could catch it on Lifetime Movie Network or WE. My husband bought me the DVD for Sweetest Day. I love it. No commercials & I can watch it whenever I want!
Title: Judith Krantz's Dazzle
